question: If you could magically gain 1 skill right now just from reading a wikiHow article, what would it be?
ans: Pet telepathy: the ability to talk to animals.
Invisibility: the ability to vanish without a trace.
Persuasion: the ability to get people to do whatever I want.
Intuition: the ability to know how something works, just by looking at it.

question: We're casting a play starring wikiHow users! What's your role? (For the record, we're not actually doing this…yet!)
ans: I'm a writer! I put my pen to work writing every little scene and line, making sure they're top quality.
I'm the star! The audience follows my gripping story and learns something new by the end. And I get loads of awards.
I'm a background actor that offers a helpful tip or a snappy joke that gives the whole thing some flavor.
I'm the scenery artist! I’m making a beautiful, hand-illustrated prop to help the audience get immersed.

question: How do you respond when a friend asks for help with a project?
ans: Sign me up! I'm always willing to lend a hand.
Hold on, I need to hear what we're doing first before I make a decision...
No thanks, I've got my own mountain of projects to finish!
I'm gonna do the same project but better, just to foster a little healthy competition.

question: No particular reason for this question, but how do you feel about fish?
ans: I love fish. I love eating them, specifically.
I've never really trusted fish. They just seem like they're up to something. Something fishy.
Fish are the cutest animals on planet Earth. I couldn't even bring myself to eat them, they're so cute.
I try to stay far away from fish. They're slimy and cold. And smelly.

question: What genre of wikiHow article are you most likely to read?
ans: Sports & fitness. wikiHow is my personal trainer!
Pets & animals. wikiHow is my personal animal whisperer!
Food & cooking. wikiHow is my personal chef!
Careers & jobs. wikiHow is my go-to business partner!

question: You're being ambushed! Grab a weapon to defend yourself:
ans: A sword and ninja stars, naturally! I don't know how to use them, but there's a wikiHow article for that!
I'll stick with my fists. They're all I need.
A slingshot that shoots something heavy, like potatoes. I'll have the firepower advantage!
Wait wait wait! Can't we just talk this out?

question: What are you most likely to do when you're bored?
ans: Think of all the ways I'd make the world a better place if I were in charge.
Dream of making a new, perfect life for myself.
Work on a new, practical skill. Like kickboxing. Or crochet.
Research obscure topics and wild periods in history.

question: Do you enjoy teaching or showing other people how to do something?
ans: Yes! I like helping people learn and grow.
Yes, but mostly because I like to be in control, if I’m being totally honest...
Not really, I prefer letting other people teach me new things!
No! It's way too much responsibility for me.
